name: ruhulfbr/cashapp-receipt-verifier
description: The `cashapp-receipt-verifier` is a PHP package designed to facilitate the verification of web receipts generated by the CashApp platform. This package provides functionality to validate the integrity of CashApp receipts by checking various attributes such as the username, payment reference, and receipt URL. It utilizes HTTP requests to communicate with the CashApp servers and verifies the received responses against predefined criteria.
